label: آيَةُ الْكُرْسی
translation: Allah — there is no god except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of all.

label: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَد
translation: Say: He is Allah, the One.

label: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَق
translation: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of the dawn.

label: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ
translation: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind.

label: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
translation: There is no god except Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the kingdom and all praise, and He has power over all things.

label: رَضِيتُ بِاللَّهِ رَبًا وَ بِالْإِسْلَامِ دِينًا وَ بِمُحَمَّدٍ نَّبِيَّا
translation: I am pleased with Allah as my Lord, with Islam as my religion, and with Muhammad as my Prophet.

label: بسْمِ اللهِ الَّذِي لَا يَفُرُ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٍ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيم
translation: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing on earth or in the heavens can cause harm, and He is the All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

label: اعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّمَاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
translation: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

label: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ عَدَدَ خَلْقِهِ وَرِضَى نَفْسِهِ وَزِنَةً عَرْشِهِ وَ مِدَادَ كَلِمَاتِهِ
translation: Glory be to Allah and all praise is His, as many times as His creation, as much as pleases Him, equal to the weight of His Throne, and equal to the ink of His words.

label: اسْتَغْفِرُ الهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيَ الْقَيُّومُ وَاتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ
translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah, besides whom there is no god, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer, and I repent to Him.

label: اللَّهُمَّ أَجِرْنِي مِنَ النَّارِ
translation: O Allah, protect me from the Fire.

label: اللَّهُم بِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا أَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ اصْبَحْنَا (وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ تَمُوْتُ وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ وَإِلَيْكَ النُّهُورُ(
translation: O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening. By You we live and by You we die, and to You is the return and the resurrection.

label: أَصْبَحْنَا (أَمْسَيْنَا) عَلَى فِطْرَةِ الْإِسْلَامِ وَعَلَى كَلِمَةِ الْإِخْلَاصِ وَعَلَى دِينِ نَبِيِّنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى مِلَّةِ أَبِينَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ حَنِيفًا مُسْلِمًا وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِينَ
translation: We have entered the morning (or evening) upon the natural religion of Islam, upon the word of sincerity, upon the religion of our Prophet Muhammad, and upon the way of our forefather Ibrahim, upright and submissive, and he was not among those who associate partners with Allah.

label: أَصْبَحْنَا وَأَصْبَحَ الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ أَمْسَيْنَا وَأَمْسَى الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ رَبِّ أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ مَا فِي هَذَا الْيَوْمِ وَخَيْرَ مَا بَعْدَهُ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا فِي هَذَا الْيَوْمِ وَشَرِّ مَا بَعْدَهُ رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَلِ وَسُوءِ الْكِبَرِ رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ فِي النَّارِ وَعَذَابٍ فِي الْقَبْرِ
translation: We have entered the morning and sovereignty belongs to Allah (or evening and sovereignty belongs to Allah). All praise is for Allah. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He has power over all things. My Lord, I ask You for the good of this day (or night) and the good that follows it, and I seek refuge in You from the evil of this day (or night) and the evil that follows it. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from laziness and from miserable old age. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the Fire and the punishment of the grave.

label: يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّومُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ اسْتَغِيثُ أَصْلِحْ لِي شَأْنِي كُلَّهُ وَلَا تَكِلْنِي إِلَى نَفْسِي طَرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ
translation: O Ever-Living, O Self-Sustaining, by Your mercy I seek help. Rectify all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself even for the blink of an eye.

label: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي دِينِي وَدُنْيَايَ وَأَهْلِي وَمَالِي اسْتُرْ عَوْرَاتِي وَآمِنْ رَوْعَاتِي اللَّهُمَّ احْفَظْنِي مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيَّ وَمِنْ خَلْفِي وَعَنْ يَمِينِي وَعَنْ شِمَالِي وَمِنْ فَوْقِي وَأَعُوذُ بِعَظَمَتِكَ أَنْ أُغْتَالَ مِنْ تَحْتِي
translation: O Allah, I ask You for well-being in this world and the Hereafter. O Allah, I ask You for forgiveness and well-being in my religion, my worldly affairs, my family, and my wealth. Conceal my faults and calm my fears. O Allah, protect me from before me and from behind me, from my right and from my left, and from above me, and I seek refuge in Your greatness lest I be taken unawares from beneath me.

label: اللَّهُمَّ عَالِمَ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ فَاطِرَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ رَبَّ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَمَلِيكَهُ أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ نَفْسِي وَمِنْ شَرِّ الشَّيْطَانِ وَشِرْكِهِ
translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You. I seek refuge in You from the evil of my own self and from the evil of Shaytan and his influence.

label: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ وَأَنَا عَلَى عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ أَبُوءُ لَكَ بِنِعْمَتِكَ عَلَيَّ وَأَبُوءُ بِذَنْبِي فَاغْفِرْ لِي فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You. You created me and I am Your servant, and I abide by Your covenant and promise as best I can. I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done. I acknowledge before You Your favors upon me and I acknowledge my sins, so forgive me, for indeed none forgives sins except You.

label: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمَّدِه
translation: Glory be to Allah, and all praise is for Him.

label: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْه
translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah and I repent to Him.

label: ُبْحَانَ الله
translation: Glory be to Allah.

label: الحمد لله
translation: All praise is for Allah.

label: الله أكبر
translation: Allah is the Greatest.

label: لَاحَوْلَ وَلَا قَوَّةً إِلَّا بِاللَّه
translation: There is no power and no strength except with Allah.

label: حَسْبُنَا اللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيلُ
translation: Allah is sufficient for us, and He is the best Disposer of affairs.

label: سورة البقرة کی آخری 2 آیات
translation: The last two verses of Surah Al-Baqarah.

label: سورة الملك
translation: Surah Al-Mulk.

label: درود شریف
translation: Sending blessings and peace upon the Prophet Muhammad ﷺ.
